client_profile_secondary_school_name: Liceo Artistico Statale Mario Sironi Sassari
client_profile_higher_education_0_univer: Academy of Fine Arts of Florence
client_description_Summary_Note:
Esposito Rizzo Silvestri and the RM were introduced at a charity run in Rome. They ran side by side and discussed their philanthropic goals, which led to a meaningful collaboration.
Esposito Rizzo Silvestri is a 51 year old Creative Director from Italy. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Esposito Rizzo Silvestri has been happily married to Daniela since 2007. They are proud parents of 1 child: Gaia.
client_description_Education_Background:
Esposito graduated from Liceo Artistico Statale Mario Sironi Sassari in 1991.
Esposito finished his studies at Academy of Fine Arts of Florence in 1996.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Esposito Rizzo Silvestri is a 51 year old Creative Director from Italy. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
At Giorgio Armani S.p.A., Esposito Rizzo Silvestri held the position of Assistant Designer from 1997 to 2001, developing essential skills in the field.
His subsequent role was as a Senior Designer at Giorgio Armani S.p.A., where he continued to grow professionally from 2003 to 2007.
From 2008 till now, he served as a Creative Director at Prada S.p.A., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 600000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Taranto, Rome and Verona, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited 250000 EUR from his grandfather, a well-known Oil and Gas Executive, in 2014, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is very happy to have Esposito as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
